title: got a permabanned because of a teammate on purpose
body:
i got a permaban after a normal game. the reason behind it was in champ select a jhin wrote "hey write two times kys in game and i won't troll", so i wrote it because i just wanted to enjoy a normal game.

Game 1
GFriend Eunha: kys
GFriend Eunha: kys
GFriend Eunha: gj team
GFriend Eunha: gj team
GFriend Eunha: <3

two months ago i have already got a suspension and after that i really wanted to reform so in that game i did it because the 3 players in my team and me wont have a troll in game.

replies.body:
Considering OP has asked people to stop commenting here and a lot of people are simply using this thread to insult each other/OP for actions taken, this thread is being locked. If anyone has any comments, questions, or concerns about this please feel free to hop over to the [Moderation Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/qVlculPP-boards-moderation-discord).

Please remember to keep discussion constructive and polite - even if you feel someone is lying or not telling the truth, or if you disagree with them.

>  the reason behind it was in champ select a jhin wrote "hey write two times kys in game and i won't troll"

No, he didn't. 

They did not tell you anything in pre-game. You did try to make it seem like that was the case though.

Then I'm afraid the response needed to be in Teamspeak as well. Bringing unacceptable language into League's chat where others can see it just because your friend is "joking" around with you isn't a good excuse.

> [{quoted}](name=GFriend Eunha,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AtZLfEBz,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-09T22:45:27.809+0000)
>
> read my comment below ty. and btw i think if he can see the chatlogs he could also see that i was playing with premades

Playing with premades does not exempt you from the rules, especially since you had a random player on your team who was exposed to your usage of that phrase.

> [{quoted}](name=GFriend Eunha,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AtZLfEBz,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-09T22:56:08.473+0000)
>
> you didnt see what that jhin wrote. and i was not telling that to him. after that i read a post were the case was true. i think i got banned because of the automatic system. because i just wrote it 2 times. because after that praised them.

Riot has a zero tolerance policy on that phrase, yes. What any other player wrote is immaterial in this situation. Full stop.

> [{quoted}](name=GFriend Eunha,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AtZLfEBz,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-11-09T23:28:03.422+0000)
>
> we were 4 premades if that jhin doesnt like to read stuff like that he could also mute us. i mean yes you invented the /whisper command for this reason but for what you implemented the mute command?

Mute was implemented as a defense against toxicity, NOT an excuse for allowing it. Just because someone has a bulletproof vest doesn't mean you're suddenly allowed to shoot them, after all.

> i never treated unknown players bad

Not only were you treating the only person not in your premade badly, your premade also didn't appreciate your comments. They reported you for your behavior, as well as spoke up in chat about your behavior.

This is your 8th penalty.

You also lied in an attempt to get unbanned.

No, this perma-ban will not be overturned.

I'd love to help, but I can't.

You need to open a ticket. Only player support handles account deletion.

You can open a support ticket requesting account deactivation. They will be able to help with that. The summoner/user name however will not be available if that is your aim.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784-Account-Deletion-FAQ#h2q2

"If your account has been permabanned for any reason, that Summoner name will not be released when the account is deleted."

That doesn't matter if another player was forced to see it.

> [{quoted}](name=GFriend Eunha,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AtZLfEBz,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2017-11-09T22:40:11.612+0000)...because after i got banned one of my friend metioned that there were cases like that i said above, but he never thought that this would happened in that game.

Unfortunately, your friend was wrong. Encouragement to self-harm are not funny, and unless EVERYONE on your team is okay with it it's not acceptable. Someone clearly wasn't. Also, threatening to troll games unless players take certain actions is punishable, and when they're encouraging actions that are violations of the Terms of Use that behavior is escalated. Your friend should NOT do that.

Unfortunately, the "my friend didn't think it would happen and so I told another player to kill themselves" excuse is not going to be sufficient here. :(

> [{quoted}](name=GFriend Eunha,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AtZLfEBz,comment-id=000400000000000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-09T23:02:00.098+0000)
